name: FPS Project (Prototype)
description:
Currently Only Works On MacOS Platforms.

The Game Itself is just a prototype. Just made for testing and nothing else.

This will however be the first stepping stone for me as it is my first ever project in game development.

Do not take too much meaning into the Among Us, looking character as the player. This was simple made to be a model, later on, to be replaced.

Donations will not go through. This project was not uploaded to be payed at all.
